mapper.insert: INSERT INTO theater(theaterno, memno, tname, tinfo, tdate, map) VALUES(theater_seq.nextval, #{memno}, #{tname} ,#{tinfo}, sysdate, #{map})
mapper.select: SELECT theaterno, memno, tname, tinfo, tdate, map FROM theater ORDER BY theaterno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE theater SET map=#{map} WHERE theaterno=#{theaterno}
